languages.text: "Наставник... Наша последняя схватка — твой финальный урок. Раны, что ты оставил — прощальный дар. Я буду лелеять их. До тех пор, пока Неумирающий не призовет меня".

traits.locale_text: "Наставник... Наша последняя схватка — твой финальный урок. Раны, что ты оставил — прощальный дар. Я буду лелеять их. До тех пор, пока Неумирающий не призовет меня".

languages.text: "Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."
languages.original_text: "Наставник... Наша последняя схватка — твой финальный урок. Раны, что ты оставил — прощальный дар. Я буду лелеять их. До тех пор, пока Неумирающий не призовет меня".

traits.locale_text: "Mentor... Our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them. Until the Undying Emperor summons me."
"Mentor... Our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them. Until the Undying Emperor summons me."
"Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."
"Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."
"Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."
"Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."
"Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."

languages.text: «Mentor... nuestro último duelo fue su lección definitiva. Las heridas que me ha causado son su regalo de despedida. Las atesoraré hasta el día en que el Emperador Inmortal me reclame».
languages.original_text: "Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."

languages.text: 「恩師よ…あの決闘があなたの最後の教えだったのですね。あなたに与えられた傷は、あなたからの別れの贈り物だった。不死の皇帝が我を呼び寄せる日まで、大切にします」
languages.original_text: "Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."

languages.text: “导师……我们之间最后的决斗，便是你给我的最后一课。而你留下的伤口，就是你的临别赠礼。我会珍惜这一切，直到不死神皇召唤我为止。”
languages.original_text: "Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."

languages.text: "Mentor ... unser jüngstes Duell war Eure letzte Lektion. Die Wunden, die Ihr verursacht habt, sind Euer Abschiedsgeschenk. Ich werde sie in Ehren halten, bis der Todlose Imperator mich ruft."
languages.original_text: "Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."

languages.text: « Mentor… Notre dernier duel a été votre ultime leçon. Les blessures que vous m'avez infligées sont votre cadeau de départ. Je les chérirai jusqu'à ce que l'Empereur Immortel me convoque. »
languages.original_text: "Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."
"Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."

languages.text: "Yönder... Son düellomuz verdiğin son dersti. Açtığın yaralar veda hediyelerindi. Ölmeyen İmparator beni huzuruna çağırana dek onların kıymetini bileceğim."
languages.original_text: "Mentor... our last duel was your final lesson. The wounds you left are your parting gift. I will treasure them, until the Undying Emperor summons me."
